change.description: Remove segol from sin, add 'c' note. (#2)
change.refuni: he patah dalet dagesh segol revia shin shin-dot segol final-nun
change.changeuni: he patah dalet dagesh segol revia shin shin-dot final-nun

change.description: Confused markings on aleph, no text change, add 't' note. (#3)
change.refuni: alef hataf-segol lamed holam he hiriq revia yod final-mem
change.changeuni: alef hataf-segol lamed holam he hiriq revia yod final-mem

notes.note: Confused markings on aleph.

change.description: Remove meteg (and associated CGJ) from vav.
change.refuni: vav meteg combining-grapheme-joiner patah yod sheva het hiriq munah yod
change.changeuni: vav patah yod sheva het hiriq munah yod

notes.note: An apparent erasure in front and below the vav may have been taken as a meteg.

change.description: Add note 'm' for possible merkha rather than meteg under the gimel.
change.refuni: gimel dagesh qamats meteg bet sheva resh tevir vav dagesh
change.changeuni: gimel dagesh qamats meteg bet sheva resh tevir vav dagesh

notes.note: The near-vertical line under the gimel lacks a northeast-southwest inclination.
The Miqra According to the Masorah (MAM) has a merkha rather than a meteg under the gimel.

change.description: Add maqaf between first resh and lamed.
change.refuni: kaf dagesh sheva dalet qamats resh sheva lamed qamats ayin holam pashta mem segol resh pashta
change.changeuni: kaf dagesh sheva dalet qamats resh sheva lamed qamats ayin holam pashta mem segol resh pashta

notes.note: An erasure between the first resh and lamed exists, representing the intent of the writer(s), not textual decay.
The Miqra According to the Masorah (MAM) displays this as a single word.

change.description: Add maqaf between first resh and lamed.
change.refuni: kaf dagesh sheva dalet qamats resh sheva lamed qamats ayin holam etnahta mem segol resh
change.changeuni: kaf dagesh sheva dalet qamats resh sheva lamed qamats ayin holam etnahta mem segol resh

notes.note: An erasure between the first resh and lamed may exist, representing the intent of the writer(s), not textual decay.
The Miqra According to the Masorah (MAM) displays this as a single word.

change.description: Add maqaf between first resh and lamed.
change.refuni: kaf dagesh sheva dalet qamats resh sheva lamed qamats ayin holam geresh mem segol resh
change.changeuni: kaf dagesh sheva dalet qamats resh sheva lamed qamats ayin holam geresh mem segol resh

notes.note: An erasure between the first resh and lamed may exist, representing the intent of the writer(s), not textual decay.
The Miqra According to the Masorah (MAM) displays this as a single word.

change.description: Place maqaf between first resh and lamed (Change made previously in changes of 2021.04.01).
change.refuni: kaf dagesh sheva dalet qamats resh maqaf lamed qamats ayin holam zaqef-qatan mem segol resh
change.changeuni: kaf dagesh sheva dalet qamats resh maqaf lamed qamats ayin holam zaqef-qatan mem segol resh

notes.note: This change is already in the UXLC text from the 2021.04.01 changes, item 2021.02.22 - 3, by Stephen Salisbury.
Speculation: The distance between the first resh and the lamed was too narrow to permit erasure as in Gen 14:1.9, 14:4.6, and 14:9.2.
The Miqra According to the Masorah (MAM) has no maqaf between the first resh and the lamed.

date.change:
7
Gen 28 7 8
Daniel Holman daniel.holman@mail.com true
Change merkha on dalet to a meteg. Add 'm' note.
Folio_016B 2 14 Credit: Sefaria.org.
פַּדֶּ֥נָֽה> pe dagesh patah dalet dagesh segol merkha nun qamats meteg he פַּדֶּֽנָֽה pe dagesh patah dalet dagesh segol meteg nun qamats meteg he
The near-vertical line associated with the dalet lacks a northeast-southwest inclination. The near-vertical line associated with the nun lacks a northeast-southwest inclination. The UXLC text will be changed to have a meteg under the dalet to correspond to its appearance in the Leningrad Codex.
The Miqra According to the Masorah (MAM) has a merkha under the dalet and meteg under the nun.
Add m פַּדֶּֽ
Approved accent

change.description: Remove dagesh from first shin.
change.refuni: yod hiriq shin sin-dot dagesh qamats shin kaf qamats meteg resh sof-pasuq
change.changeuni: yod hiriq shin sin-dot qamats shin kaf qamats meteg resh sof-pasuq

change.description: Change meteg under het to merkha. Add note 't'.
change.refuni: het qamats meteg tet sheva alef tevir vav dagesh
change.changeuni: het qamats merkha tet sheva alef tevir vav dagesh

notes.note: The near-vertical line under the het has a slight northeast-southwest inclination.
The Miqra According to the Masorah (MAM) has a merkha rather than a meteg under the het.

change.description: Add maqaf between the first he and the zayin.
change.refuni: lamed qamats merkha mem dagesh qamats he space zayin dagesh segol tipeha he
change.changeuni: lamed qamats merkha mem dagesh qamats he maqaf zayin dagesh segol tipeha he

notes.note: The putative maqaf is very faint. A maqaf at this point would place two accents on a single poetic word.
The Miqra According to the Masorah (MAM) does not have a maqaf between these words.

change.description: Change the merkha under the tav to a tevir.
change.refuni: vav sheva nun qamats tav patah tav dagesh hiriq merkha yod
change.changeuni: vav sheva nun qamats tav patah tav dagesh hiriq merkha yod

notes.note: The putative tevir dot is very faint. The text has other weak dots in the vicinity.
The Miqra According to the Masorah (MAM) does not have a tevir on this word.

change.description: Change meteg under nun to merkha. Add note 't'.
change.refuni: vav sheva nun qamats meteg tav sheva nun tevir vav dagesh
change.changeuni: vav sheva nun qamats merkha tav sheva nun tevir vav dagesh

notes.note: The near-vertical line on the nun has a very slight northeast-southwest inclination.
The Miqra According to the Masorah (MAM) has a merkha rather than a meteg under the nun.

change.description: Move meteg from yod to first vav, add note 't'.
change.refuni: vav patah yod dagesh meteg combining-grapheme-joiner patah ayin hataf-patah shin sin-dot tipeha vav dagesh
change.changeuni: vav patah meteg yod dagesh patah ayin hataf-patah shin sin-dot tipeha vav dagesh

notes.note: The meteg is under the patah of the vav.
The Miqra According to the Masorah (MAM) has the meteg under the yod as would be expected.

change.description: Add note 'm' for possible merkha rather than meteg under yod.
change.refuni: yod qamats meteg tsadi sheva alef tevir vav dagesh
change.changeuni: yod qamats meteg tsadi sheva alef tevir vav dagesh

notes.note: The near-vertical line on the yod has the wrong inclination (northwest-southeast) for a merkha.
The Miqra According to the Masorah (MAM) has a merkha rather than a meteg under the yod.

change.description: Extraneous dot under he, add 't' note. (#8)
change.refuni: he patah het tsere pashta lamed segol bet pashta
change.changeuni: he patah het tsere pashta lamed segol bet pashta

notes.note: The Miqra According to the Masorah (MAM) has a patah under the he.

change.description: Dagesh on second mem is faint. Add note 't.
change.refuni: mem hiriq mem dagesh segol geresh nun dagesh qamats he
change.changeuni: mem hiriq mem dagesh segol geresh nun dagesh qamats he

notes.note: The dagesh in the second mem is faint and off-centered.

change.description: Add note 'm' for possible merkha rather than meteg under yod.
change.refuni: vav patah yod dagesh tsere meteg tsadi sheva alef tevir vav dagesh
change.changeuni: vav patah yod dagesh tsere meteg tsadi sheva alef tevir vav dagesh

notes.note: The near-vertical line on the yod lacks the northeast-southwest inclination for a merkha.
The Miqra According to the Masorah (MAM) has a merkha rather than a meteg under the yod.

date.change:
18
Ex 37 25 10
Daniel Holman daniel.holman@mail.com true
Change qamats under the resh to a hataf qamats.
Folio_054B 2 6 Credit: Sefaria.org.
רָחְבּ֜וֹ> resh qamats het sheva bet dagesh geresh vav holam רָחְבּ֜וֹ resh qamats het sheva bet dagesh geresh vav holam
The putative hataf dots are noticeably lower than the qamats. The text has many dots floating around in this area.
Approved NoAction

19
Num 10 19 8
Daniel Holman daniel.holman@mail.com true
Replace meteg under resh with merkha.
Folio_081A 3 20 Credit: Sefaria.org.
צוּרִֽי> tsadi vav dagesh resh hiriq meteg yod צוּרִֽי tsadi vav dagesh resh hiriq meteg yod
The next word is the last in the verse and necessarily contains a meteg in the role of a siluq. The putative merkha is parallel to this meteg and lacks the northeast to southwest inclination of a merkha. The space to the next word has an erasure may have contained a maqaf.
The Miqra According to the Masorah (MAM) has a meteg on the resh and doesn't split this word from the next with a maqaf.
Approved NoAction

20
Num 11 20 19
Daniel Holman daniel.holman@mail.com true
Add note 't' as text is damaged.
Folio_082A 2 4 Credit: Sefaria.org.
לְפָנָיו֙> lamed sheva pe qamats nun qamats yod vav pashta לְפָנָיו֙ lamed sheva pe qamats nun qamats yod vav pashta
The lower half of the word is damaged.
The current text agrees with that of the Miqra According to the Masorah (MAM).
Add t לְפָנָיו֙
Approved NoTextChange

21
Num 12 9 1
Daniel Holman daniel.holman@mail.com true
Add sheva under resh. Merge with following word.
Folio_082B 2 9 Credit: Sefaria.org.
וַיִּֽחַר אַ֧ף> vav patah yod dagesh hiriq meteg het patah resh space alef patah darga final-pe וַיִּֽחַרְאַ֧ף vav patah yod dagesh hiriq meteg het patah resh sheva alef patah darga final-pe
Merging this word with following word produces a properly-accented word and is accepted elsewhere.
The Miqra According to the Masorah (MAM) has a maqaf on this word connecting it to the next word which has an accent. It does not have a sheva on the resh.
2
Approved merge/vowel

change.description: Add note 'm' for possible merkha rather than meteg under first nun.
change.refuni: vav sheva nun qamats meteg tav sheva nun tevir vav dagesh
change.changeuni: vav sheva nun qamats meteg tav sheva nun tevir vav dagesh

notes.note: The near-vertical line under the nun lacks a northeast-southwest inclination.
The Miqra According to the Masorah (MAM) has a merkha rather than a meteg under the nun.

23
Num 21 1 11
Daniel Holman daniel.holman@mail.com true
Change patah on aleph to qamats.
Folio_088A 2 26 Credit: Sefaria.org.
הָאֲתָרִ֑ים> he qamats alef hataf-patah tav qamats resh hiriq etnahta yod final-mem הָאֲתָרִ֑ים he qamats alef hataf-patah tav qamats resh hiriq etnahta yod final-mem
The putative qamats dot is lighter than those on the sheva on the aleph or the qamats on the following letter.
Approved NoAction

24
Num 22 23 14
Daniel Holman daniel.holman@mail.com true
Dagesh on dalet is light. Add 't' note.
Folio_089B 1 5 Credit: Sefaria.org.
הַדֶּ֔רֶךְ> he patah dalet dagesh segol zaqef-qatan resh segol final-kaf sheva הַדֶּ֔רֶךְ he patah dalet dagesh segol zaqef-qatan resh segol final-kaf sheva
The dagesh on the dalet is light, but well positioned.
Add t הַדֶּ֔
Approved NoTextChange

change.description: Add note 'm' for possible merkha rather than meteg under het.
change.refuni: tav dagesh tsere het qamats meteg lamed sheva tsadi tevir vav dagesh
change.changeuni: tav dagesh tsere het qamats meteg lamed sheva tsadi tevir vav dagesh

notes.note: The near-vertical line under the gimel lacks a northeast-southwest inclination.
The Miqra According to the Masorah (MAM) has a merkha rather than a meteg under the het.

change.description: Consider possible vav between aleph and tav.
change.refuni: he qamats meteg resh holam alef holam zaqef-qatan tav
change.changeuni: he qamats meteg resh holam alef holam zaqef-qatan tav

notes.note: The contents of the space between the aleph and the tav are faint and uncertain.

change.description: Replace meteg under nun with munah.
change.refuni: vav dagesh bet sheva nun tsere meteg yod
change.changeuni: vav dagesh bet sheva nun tsere munah yod

change.description: Place pashta above sin, replace merkha with meteg below. Add note 't'.
change.refuni: tav patah ayin hataf-patah shin sin-dot segol merkha he maqaf
change.changeuni: tav patah ayin hataf-patah shin sin-dot segol pashta meteg he maqaf

notes.note: This text is in a Decalogue and is expected to have dual accents.
The mark above the sin is small and light, starting on the rightmost leg of the sin. The near-vertical line below the shin is faint, short and broken, more likely to be a meteg than merkha.
The Miqra According to the Masorah (MAM) has a pashta over the shin and a meteg below.

change.description: Interchange order of tevir and munah on mem so that the tevir comes first.
change.refuni: shin shin-dot qamats mem munah tevir vav holam resh
change.changeuni: shin shin-dot qamats mem tevir munah vav holam resh

notes.note: This text is in a Decalogue and is expected to have dual accents.
The Miqra According to the Masorah (MAM) has tevir then the munah on the mem.

change.description: Change meteg under tsadi to tipeha.
change.refuni: tav dagesh rafe hiriq resh sheva tsadi qamats meteg het sof-pasuq
change.changeuni: tav dagesh rafe hiriq resh sheva tsadi qamats tipeha het sof-pasuq

notes.note: This text is in a Decalogue and is expected to have dual accents.
Only one accent is below the tsadi and it's curved like a tipeha.
The Miqra According to the Masorah (MAM) has tipeha then meteg under the tsadi.

change.description: Add dagesh to tav.
change.refuni: tav holam alef bet tsere dalet etnahta vav dagesh final-nun
change.changeuni: tav dagesh holam alef bet tsere dalet etnahta vav dagesh final-nun

notes.note: The dagesh is dark and well-positioned.

change.description: Add note 'm' for possible merkha rather than meteg under nun.
change.refuni: nun qamats meteg samekh sheva ayin tevir vav dagesh
change.changeuni: nun qamats meteg samekh sheva ayin tevir vav dagesh

notes.note: The near-vertical line under the gimel lacks a northeast-southwest inclination.
The Miqra According to the Masorah (MAM) has a merkha rather than a meteg under the nun.

change.description: Change meteg to merkha under yod.
change.refuni: yod qamats meteg dalet sheva final-kaf qamats tevir
change.changeuni: yod qamats merkha dalet sheva final-kaf qamats tevir

notes.note: The near-vertical line under the yod moves distinctly from northeast to southwest. This is the best example of a merkha in these changes.
The Miqra According to the Masorah (MAM) has a merkha rather than a meteg under the yod.

change.description: Change meteg to merkha under yod. Add 't' note.
change.refuni: yod holam meteg shin shin-dot sheva bet tsere tevir yod
change.changeuni: yod holam merkha shin shin-dot sheva bet tsere tevir yod

notes.note: The near-vertical line under the yod moves slightly from northeast to southwest. Note that the line appears to be made two overwritten lines, one of which is vertical.
The Miqra According to the Masorah (MAM) has a merkha rather than a meteg under the yod.

change.description: Replace meteg under pe with merkha. Add note 't'.
change.refuni: vav dagesh pe qamats meteg qof sheva dalet tevir vav dagesh
change.changeuni: vav dagesh pe qamats merkha qof sheva dalet tevir vav dagesh

notes.note: The near-vertical line on the pe has a very slight northeast-southwest inclination.
The Miqra According to the Masorah (MAM) has a merkha rather than a meteg under the pe.

change.description: Add pashta over aleph.
change.refuni: vav sheva resh qamats alef hiriq yod tav qamats pashta
change.changeuni: vav sheva resh qamats alef hiriq yod tav qamats pashta

notes.note: The vertical line between the aleph and the yod is from the tevir on the previous verse, Deut 20:11.8. The smudge on the upper, right arm of the aleph doesn't have enough form to be considered a pashta.
The Miqra According to the Masorah (MAM) has a pashta over both the aleph and the tav.

change.description: Change meteg under bet to merkha. Add note 't'.
change.refuni: vav dagesh bet qamats meteg kaf sheva tav qamats tevir he
change.changeuni: vav dagesh bet qamats merkha kaf sheva tav qamats tevir he

notes.note: The near-vertical line on the bet has a slight northeast-southwest inclination.
The Miqra According to the Masorah (MAM) has a merkha rather than a meteg under the bet.

change.description: Add note 'm' for possible merkha rather than meteg under lamed.
change.refuni: vav sheva lamed qamats meteg qof sheva het tevir vav dagesh
change.changeuni: vav sheva lamed qamats meteg qof sheva het tevir vav dagesh

notes.note: The near-vertical line on the lamed doesn't incline from northeast to southwest. Its inclination is less than on the tipeha on the same word.
The Miqra According to the Masorah (MAM) has a merkha rather than a meteg under the lamed.

change.description: Change meteg under aleph to merkha. Add note 't'.
change.refuni: vav sheva alef qamats meteg mem sheva resh tevir vav dagesh
change.changeuni: vav sheva alef qamats merkha mem sheva resh tevir vav dagesh

notes.note: The near-vertical line on the aleph has a slight curvature, northeast to southwest. Its inclination is comparable to that of the tipeha on the same word.
The Miqra According to the Masorah (MAM) has a merkha rather than a meteg under the aleph.

change.description: Remove dagesh from tsadi.
change.refuni: bet dagesh patah meteg tsadi dagesh qamats he hataf-qamats resh patah revia yod hiriq final-mem
change.changeuni: bet dagesh patah meteg tsadi qamats he hataf-qamats resh patah revia yod hiriq final-mem

change.description: Markings under the second tsadi are smudged. Add note 't'.
change.refuni: he patah tsadi dagesh sheva lamed qamats tsadi patah meteg lamed sof-pasuq
change.changeuni: he patah tsadi dagesh sheva lamed qamats tsadi patah meteg lamed sof-pasuq

notes.note: The Miqra According to the Masorah (MAM) has a patah then meteg under the second tsadi.

change.description: Markings under the kaf are smudged. Add note 't'.
change.refuni: kaf dagesh hiriq meteg yod maqaf
change.changeuni: kaf dagesh hiriq meteg yod maqaf

notes.note: The text in this area is in bad shape. The markings under the kaf are smudged and the maqaf is very faint.
The Miqra According to the Masorah (MAM) has a hiriq then meteg under the kaf.

change.description: Change sheva under yod to hiriq; change munah on shin to meteg. Add note 't'.
change.refuni: yod sheva he vav holam shin shin-dot qubuts munah ayin patah maqaf
change.changeuni: yod hiriq he vav holam shin shin-dot qubuts meteg ayin patah maqaf

notes.note: The text of this word is of poor quality. Although the usual spelling of Joshua has a sheva under the yod, the LC has only one dot under the yod. The shuruq under the shin is unclear; the other mark under the shin is a meteg. The furtive patah for the ayin is too advanced.
The Miqra According to the Masorah (MAM) has a sheva under the yod and a meteg under the shin.

change.description: Remove maqaf from end of word. Add note 'c'.
change.refuni: bet dagesh hiriq final-nun maqaf
change.changeuni: bet dagesh hiriq final-nun

notes.note: A maqaf is expected at end of word.
The Miqra According to the Masorah (MAM) has a maqaf at end of word.

change.description: Place telisha gedola over tsadi.
change.refuni: he telisha-gedola vav holam tsadi hiriq yod alef hiriq yod
change.changeuni: he telisha-gedola vav holam tsadi hiriq telisha-gedola yod alef hiriq yod

notes.note: The circle over the aleph is a masora circle; it's too far above the aleph to be a telisha gedola.
The Miqra According to the Masorah (MAM) has a telisha gedola over the tsadi.

change.description: Move etnahta from under bet to under the kaf.
change.refuni: yod hiriq shin shin-dot sheva kaf dagesh qamats bet etnahta vav dagesh final-nun
change.changeuni: yod hiriq shin shin-dot sheva kaf dagesh qamats etnahta bet vav dagesh final-nun

notes.note: The etnahta clearly belongs to the kaf; space was available to place it under the bet if that was the intent.
The Miqra According to the Masorah (MAM) has the etnahta under the bet.

change.description: The meteg belonging to the nun might be a merkha, but is not sufficiently inclined. Add note 'm'.
change.refuni: nun holam meteg shin sin-dot sheva alef tsere tevir yod
change.changeuni: nun holam meteg shin sin-dot sheva alef tsere tevir yod

notes.note: The possible merkha under the nun-gimel space is not as inclined northeast to southwest as the following tevir and appears perpendicular to the base of the nun.
The Miqra According to the Masorah (MAM) has a merkha under the nun.

change.description: Change the patah under the ayin to hataf patah.
change.refuni: nun patah meteg ayin patah lamed sheva final-kaf qamats pashta
change.changeuni: nun patah meteg ayin hataf-patah lamed sheva final-kaf qamats pashta

notes.note: The text is severely damaged. Nevertheless, double dots forming a hataf sign are present.
The Miqra According to the Masorah (MAM) has a patah under the ayin.

change.description: The meteg belonging to the nun might be a merkha, but is not sufficiently inclined. Add note 'm'.
change.refuni: vav patah yod dagesh hiriq nun dagesh qamats meteg gimel sheva ayin tevir vav dagesh
change.changeuni: vav patah yod dagesh hiriq nun dagesh qamats meteg gimel sheva ayin tevir vav dagesh

notes.note: The possible merkha under the nun-gimel space is not as inclined northeast to southwest as the following tevir.
The Miqra According to the Masorah (MAM) has a merkha under the nun.

change.description: Change patah under ayin to qamats. Add 'c' note.
change.refuni: yod sheva he vav holam shin shin-dot qubuts ayin patah pashta
change.changeuni: yod sheva he vav holam shin shin-dot qubuts ayin qamats pashta

notes.note: The LC's qamats on the ayin is effectively a "furtive" qamats.
The Miqra According to the Masorah (MAM) has a patah under the ayin.

change.description: Remove dagesh from yod.
change.refuni: vav patah yod dagesh patah kaf dagesh munah vav dagesh he qamats
change.changeuni: vav patah yod patah kaf dagesh munah vav dagesh he qamats

notes.note: The LC text is very damaged in this word; however, the lack of a dagesh on the yod is certain.
The Miqra According to the Masorah (MAM) has a dagesh on the yod.

change.description: Remove dagesh from yod.
change.refuni: vav patah yod dagesh hiriq qof dagesh patah qadma het
change.changeuni: vav patah yod hiriq qof dagesh patah qadma het

notes.note: The Miqra According to the Masorah (MAM) has a dagesh on the yod.

change.description: Change qamats under kaf to sheva.
change.refuni: kaf dagesh qamats lamed maqaf
change.changeuni: kaf dagesh sheva lamed maqaf

notes.note: The Miqra According to the Masorah (MAM) has a qamats on the kaf.

change.description: Add dagesh to second qof.
change.refuni: he patah qof dagesh patah resh sheva qof qamats meteg ayin qamats he sof-pasuq
change.changeuni: he patah qof dagesh patah resh sheva qof qamats dagesh meteg ayin qamats he sof-pasuq

notes.note: The Miqra According to the Masorah (MAM) has no dagesh on the second qof.

change.description: Possible dagesh in he. Add note 't'.
change.refuni: mem hiriq bet dagesh patah ayin hataf-patah lamed qamats merkha he
change.changeuni: mem hiriq bet dagesh patah ayin hataf-patah lamed qamats merkha he

notes.note: The dagesh is well-shaped and well-positioned, but faint. It is not expected here.
The Miqra According to the Masorah (MAM) has no dagesh on the he.

change.description: Possible dagesh in bet. Add note 't'.
change.refuni: lamed hiriq bet sheva nun tsere merkha yod
change.changeuni: lamed hiriq bet sheva nun tsere merkha yod

notes.note: The dagesh is well-shaped but a little low and faint.
The Miqra According to the Masorah (MAM) has no dagesh on the bet.

change.description: Remove dagesh from first sin.
change.refuni: lamed sheva yod hiriq qadma shin sin-dot dagesh qamats shin kaf qamats zaqef-qatan resh
change.changeuni: lamed sheva yod hiriq qadma shin sin-dot qamats shin kaf qamats zaqef-qatan resh

notes.note: The Miqra According to the Masorah (MAM) has a dagesh on the first sin.

change.description: Remove dagesh from first sin.
change.refuni: yod hiriq shin sin-dot dagesh qamats shin kaf qamats tipeha resh
change.changeuni: yod hiriq shin sin-dot qamats shin kaf qamats tipeha resh

notes.note: The Miqra According to the Masorah (MAM) has a dagesh on the first sin.

change.description: Remove dagesh from first sin.
change.refuni: yod hiriq shin sin-dot dagesh qamats shin kaf qamats tipeha resh
change.changeuni: yod hiriq shin sin-dot qamats shin kaf qamats tipeha resh

notes.note: The Miqra According to the Masorah (MAM) has a dagesh on the first sin.

change.description: Accent on nun is a merkha. Add note 'c'
change.refuni: zayin hiriq qof sheva nun tsere merkha yod maqaf
change.changeuni: zayin hiriq qof sheva nun tsere merkha yod maqaf

notes.note: The accent under the nun has a distinct northeast to southwest inclination.
The Miqra According to the Masorah (MAM) has a meteg under the nun.

change.description: Accent on ayin might be a merkha. Add note 'm'
change.refuni: he qamats ayin hiriq meteg yod resh
change.changeuni: he qamats ayin hiriq meteg yod resh

notes.note: The accent on ayin lacks the northeast to southwest inclination to be a merkha.
The Miqra According to the Masorah (MAM) has a merkha under the ayin.

change.description: Remove dagesh from first sin.
change.refuni: yod hiriq shin sin-dot dagesh qamats shin kaf qamats munah resh
change.changeuni: yod hiriq shin sin-dot qamats shin kaf qamats munah resh

notes.note: The Miqra According to the Masorah (MAM) has a dagesh on the first sin.

change.description: Possible merkha under first nun rather than meteg. Add note 'm'.
change.refuni: nun qamats meteg tav sheva nun tevir vav dagesh
change.changeuni: nun qamats meteg tav sheva nun tevir vav dagesh

notes.note: The accent under the first nun lacks the northeast to southwest inclination of a merkha.
The Miqra According to the Masorah (MAM) has a merkha on the first nun.

change.description: Remove dagesh from first sin.
change.refuni: yod hiriq shin sin-dot dagesh qamats shin kaf qamats zaqef-qatan resh
change.changeuni: yod hiriq shin sin-dot qamats shin kaf qamats zaqef-qatan resh

notes.note: The Miqra According to the Masorah (MAM) has a dagesh on the first sin.

change.description: Remove dagesh from yod. Add note 't'.
change.refuni: vav patah yod dagesh hiriq tav dagesh tsere mahapakh final-nun
change.changeuni: vav patah yod hiriq tav dagesh tsere mahapakh final-nun

notes.note: The putative dagesh on the yod is very faint and may have been erased. It is much weaker the dagesh on the following tav.
The Miqra According to the Masorah (MAM) has a dagesh on the yod.

change.description: Add qadma to kaf. Add note 'c'.
change.refuni: kaf dagesh qamats lamed maqaf
change.changeuni: kaf dagesh qamats qadma lamed maqaf

notes.note: The image shows a poetic word composed of 3 orthographic words connected by 2 maqafs. The orthographic word in question is the middle word, כָּל־.
The qadma is faint but well-formed. The aleph on the preceding orthographic word has no accent, the aleph on the following orthographic word has a zaqef qatan.
The Miqra According to the Masorah (MAM) has a qadma on the initial aleph and a zaqef qatan on the second aleph of this poetic word.

change.description: A dagesh appears to have been removed from bet.
change.refuni: gimel dagesh sheva bet vav dagesh lamed qamats meteg he dagesh sof-pasuq
change.changeuni: gimel dagesh sheva bet vav dagesh lamed qamats meteg he dagesh sof-pasuq

notes.note: A smudge is present within the bet. Adjacent dageshes are well-formed and well-positioned. Previous versions of this word in the same verse lack a dagesh on the bet.
The Miqra According to the Masorah (MAM) has no dagesh on the bet.

change.description: Change sheva on first he to a hiriq.
change.refuni: vav sheva he sheva nun dagesh tsere tevir he
change.changeuni: vav sheva he hiriq nun dagesh tsere tevir he

notes.note: Underneath the first dot below the he is a smudge. The smudge is too light and too far below the dot to be a sheva. Compare with the sheva in the preceding vav.
The Miqra According to the Masorah (MAM) has a hiriq on the first he.

change.description: Remove maqaf at end of word. Add note 'c'.
change.refuni: vav sheva alef segol tav maqaf
change.changeuni: vav sheva alef segol tav

notes.note: The large black dot at the end of the word it is not shaped like a maqaf nor does it bridge to the next word.
The Miqra According to the Masorah (MAM) has a maqaf ending this word.

change.description: Possible merkha under sin. Add note 'm'.
change.refuni: ayin qamats shin sin-dot meteg vav dagesh
change.changeuni: ayin qamats shin sin-dot meteg vav dagesh

notes.note: The mark under the sin lacks a distinct northeast to southwest inclination.
The Miqra According to the Masorah (MAM) has a merkha under the sin.

change.description: Remove dagesh from lamed. Add note 't'.
change.refuni: mem patah lamed dagesh sheva alef patah munah final-kaf sheva
change.changeuni: mem patah lamed sheva alef patah munah final-kaf sheva

notes.note: The mark under the dagesh on the lamed is weak and ill-positioned.
The Miqra According to the Masorah (MAM) lacks a dagesh on the lamed.

change.description: Move the holam from the vav to the aleph. Add note 'c'.
change.refuni: shin sin-dot sheva mem alef vav holam lamed qamats final-mem pashta
change.changeuni: shin sin-dot sheva mem alef holam vav lamed qamats final-mem pashta

notes.note: The holam in the LC is closer to the aleph than the vav.
The Miqra According to the Masorah (MAM) has the holam between the mem and the aleph.

change.description: Remove dagesh from yod
change.refuni: vav patah yod dagesh hiriq qof dagesh patah munah het
change.changeuni: vav patah yod hiriq qof dagesh patah munah het

notes.note: The mark above the nun is interpreted as a low-hanging masora circle. Neither MAM nor the UXLC show masora circles.
The Miqra According to the Masorah (MAM) has a dagesh on the yod.

change.description: Change meteg on pe to merkha.
change.refuni: pe dagesh qamats meteg shin shin-dot sheva tet tevir vav dagesh
change.changeuni: pe dagesh qamats merkha shin shin-dot sheva tet tevir vav dagesh

notes.note: The mark under the pe has a distinct northeast to southeast inclination and is thus a merkha.
The Miqra According to the Masorah (MAM) has a merkha on the pe.

change.description: Move merkha from vav to yod.
change.refuni: vav patah merkha yod dagesh holam alef mem segol resh
change.changeuni: vav patah merkha yod dagesh holam alef mem segol resh

notes.note: The mark under the yod has a slight northeast to southeast inclination and is thus a merkha.
The Miqra According to the Masorah (MAM) has a merkha on the vav.

change.description: Remove dagesh (as a shuruq dot) from second vav. Add 'c' note.
change.refuni: vav patah meteg yod dagesh patah het hataf-patah nun tipeha vav dagesh final-nun
change.changeuni: vav patah meteg yod dagesh patah het hataf-patah nun tipeha vav final-nun

notes.note: Removing the shuruq dot leaves the word incompletely vowelized; therefore a 'c' note is added.
The Miqra According to the Masorah (MAM) has a dagesh (as a shuruq dot) on the second vav.

change.description: Remove dagesh from yod.
change.refuni: vav patah yod dagesh hiriq lamed dagesh qamats tipeha het segol final-mem
change.changeuni: vav patah yod hiriq lamed dagesh qamats tipeha het segol final-mem

notes.note: The Miqra According to the Masorah (MAM) has a dagesh on the yod.

change.description: Examine dagesh on tav.
change.refuni: vav patah yod hiriq tav dagesh sheva nun tsere merkha final-mem
change.changeuni: vav patah yod hiriq tav dagesh sheva nun tsere merkha final-mem

notes.note: The dagesh on the tav is dark, but touching the tav.
The merkha on the nun is questionable.
The Miqra According to the Masorah (MAM) has a dagesh on the tav.

change.description: Remove dagesh on mem.
change.refuni: vav patah yod dagesh hiriq mem dagesh patah merkha samekh dagesh vav dagesh
change.changeuni: vav patah yod dagesh hiriq mem patah merkha samekh dagesh vav dagesh

notes.note: The Miqra According to the Masorah (MAM) has a dagesh on the mem.

change.description: Remove maqaf at end of word. Add note 'c'.
change.refuni: alef patah het hataf-patah resh tsere yod maqaf
change.changeuni: alef patah het hataf-patah resh tsere yod

notes.note: No line is present between the yod of this word and the kaf of the next word.
The Miqra According to the Masorah (MAM) has a maqaf at the end of this word.

change.description: Add telisha qetana to yod.
change.refuni: vav patah yod dagesh holam alef mem sheva resh vav dagesh telisha-qetana
change.changeuni: vav patah yod dagesh holam telisha-qetana alef mem sheva resh vav dagesh telisha-qetana

notes.note: The Miqra According to the Masorah (MAM) has a telisha qetana on the yod.

change.description: Examine dagesh in mem.
change.refuni: he tsere pashta mem dagesh qamats he pashta
change.changeuni: he tsere pashta mem dagesh qamats he pashta

notes.note: The smudge touching the inside of rightmost part of the mem is a dagesh.
The Miqra According to the Masorah (MAM) has a dagesh in the mem.

change.description: Remove dagesh from tsadi.
change.refuni: mem patah tsadi dagesh hiriq geresh yod lamed
change.changeuni: mem patah tsadi hiriq geresh yod lamed

notes.note: The smudge at the base of the following yod looks to be continuous with the yod and is not a dagesh on the tsadi.
The Miqra According to the Masorah (MAM) has a dagesh in the tsadi.

change.description: Examine for possible maqaf at end of word.
change.refuni: vav patah yod dagesh tsere mahapakh shin shin-dot sheva bet vav dagesh
change.changeuni: vav patah yod dagesh tsere mahapakh shin shin-dot sheva bet vav dagesh

notes.note: The separation between characters is confused by the blurry image. If the vav of this word is connected to the shin of the following word, so also would be this word's vav, yod, and shin.
The Miqra According to the Masorah (MAM) has no maqaf on this word.

change.description: Meteg on second mem may be a merkha. Add note 'm'. Remove maqaf at end of word. Add note 'c'.
change.refuni: mem hiriq mem dagesh patah meteg ayin hataf-patah resh tsere he maqaf
change.changeuni: mem hiriq mem dagesh patah meteg ayin hataf-patah resh tsere he

notes.note: The vertical mark under the second mem lacks the northeast-to-southwest inclination to be a merkha. No maqaf is apparent at the end of this word. The following word, which is on the next line, has no "leading" maqaf.
The Miqra According to the Masorah (MAM) has a merkha under the second mem. The Miqra According to the Masorah (MAM) has no maqaf on this word.

change.description: Remove dagesh in yod.
change.refuni: vav patah yod dagesh hiriq bet dagesh qamats he tsere tipeha lamed
change.changeuni: vav patah yod dagesh hiriq bet dagesh qamats he tsere tipeha lamed

notes.note: No dagesh is apparent in the yod, even the dagesh on the bet is weak.
The Miqra According to the Masorah (MAM) has a dagesh in the yod.

change.description: Remove dagesh in yod.
change.refuni: vav patah yod dagesh patah kaf dagesh munah vav dagesh final-mem
change.changeuni: vav patah yod patah kaf dagesh munah vav dagesh final-mem

notes.note: No dagesh is apparent in the yod.
The Miqra According to the Masorah (MAM) has a dagesh in the yod.

change.description: Replace holam on tav with hiriq. Add note 't'.
change.refuni: mem sheva tav holam final-mem pashta
change.changeuni: mem sheva tav hiriq final-mem pashta

notes.note: The darkest accent on the tav is a hiriq, the holam is much lighter.
The Miqra According to the Masorah (MAM) has a holam on the tav.

change.description: Add qadma to first lamed.
change.refuni: lamed hiriq mem sheva samekh hiriq lamed dagesh qamats zaqef-qatan he
change.changeuni: lamed hiriq qadma mem sheva samekh hiriq lamed dagesh qamats zaqef-qatan he

notes.note: A dark accent is visible on the first lamed. With change the word has two accents: a qadma on the first lamed (a conjunctive) and a zaqef qatan on the second lamed (level 2 disjunctive).
The Miqra According to the Masorah (MAM) has a qadma on the first lamed.

change.description: Add paseq (and preceding space) to end of word.
change.refuni: alef qamats lamed qamats mahapakh he
change.changeuni: alef qamats lamed qamats mahapakh he space paseq

change.description: Remove dagesh from tav.
change.refuni: tav dagesh hiriq ole resh sheva alef segol merkha he
change.changeuni: tav hiriq ole resh sheva alef segol merkha he

change.description: Add geresh muqdam to initial vav. Add note 't'.
change.refuni: vav sheva nun hiriq pe sheva lamed qamats alef revia vav holam tav
change.changeuni: vav sheva geresh-muqdam nun hiriq pe sheva lamed qamats alef revia vav holam tav

notes.note: The geresh muqdam is very faint at the top left of the initial vav. It appears to be doubled, possibly the outer edges of a single stroke.

change.description: Remove dagesh from initial tav.
change.refuni: tav dagesh sheva shin shin-dot vav dagesh ayin qamats tav hiriq etnahta yod
change.changeuni: tav sheva shin shin-dot vav dagesh ayin qamats tav hiriq etnahta yod

change.description: The merkha under second yod is ambiguous. Add 't' note.
change.refuni: yod hiriq meteg he sheva yod merkha vav dagesh
change.changeuni: yod hiriq meteg he sheva yod merkha vav dagesh

notes.note: The accent under the second yod has a slight brush mark at the bottom but has no northeast to southwest inclination.
The Miqra According to the Masorah (MAM) has a merkha under the first yod and a meteg under the second. The accompanying MAM notes describe differences among texts on these markings.

change.description: Add mahapakh to pe, change merkha under qof to meteg. Add CGJ between meteg and patah on qof to preserve ordering.
change.refuni: pe dagesh qamats qof patah merkha dalet sheva tav dagesh qamats
change.changeuni: pe dagesh qamats mahapakh qof meteg combining-grapheme-joiner patah dalet sheva tav dagesh qamats

notes.note: The mark below the qamats on the pe definitely belongs to the pe, not the line below. The accent under the qof has a slight brush mark at the top but has no northeast-to-southwest inclination. A combining grapheme joiner (CGJ) has been placed between the meteg and the patah to force the meteg-first ordering.
The UXLC transcription preserves the two-dimensional mark order of the meteg relative to the patah. Other texts may not choose to maintain this ordering as a matter of editorial policy.

change.description: Move mahapakh from ayin to dalet.
change.refuni: ayin tsere mahapakh dalet vav dagesh tav space paseq
change.changeuni: ayin tsere dalet mahapakh vav dagesh tav space paseq

change.description: Remove paseq (and preceding space).
change.refuni: alef holam yod sheva bet segol pazer yod final-kaf qamats space paseq
change.changeuni: alef holam yod sheva bet segol pazer yod final-kaf qamats

notes.note: This word is at the end of line 14, the following line starts with the divine name and has no intervening paseq.

change.description: Remove dagesh in first tav.
change.refuni: tav dagesh sheva het hiriq nun dagesh qamats tav hiriq munah yod
change.changeuni: tav sheva het hiriq nun dagesh qamats tav hiriq munah yod

change.description: Remove dagesh in dalet.
change.refuni: dalet dagesh holam geresh-muqdam revia mem segol final-nun
change.changeuni: dalet holam geresh-muqdam revia mem segol final-nun

notes.note: The text is of high quality in this region. The dalet has a dot over the rafe which could be a revia. This revia, in addition to the geresh muqdam, produces a revia mugrash accent, an accent pair common in the Sifrei Emet.

change.description: Remove geresh-muqdam from over ayin.
change.refuni: ayin holam geresh-muqdam lamed qamats lamed patah revia yod hiriq final-kaf sheva
change.changeuni: ayin holam lamed qamats lamed patah revia yod hiriq final-kaf sheva

notes.note: The preceding word, on the previous line, has a maqaf.
The final kaf has an incomplete masorah circle and rafe above it. The UXLC transcribes neither masorah circles nor rafe marks

change.description: Unexpected dot above the final-mem, add note 't'.
change.refuni: alef qamats dalet qamats munah final-mem
change.changeuni: alef qamats dalet qamats munah final-mem

notes.note: The dot above the final-mem is dark, well-formed, and difficult to explain.

change.description: Add geresh-muqdam to nun.
change.refuni: nun sheva dalet qamats resh patah revia yod
change.changeuni: nun sheva geresh-muqdam dalet qamats resh patah revia yod

notes.note: The geresh-muqdam above the nun is dark and well-formed. This geresh muqdam, in addition to the revia accent, produces a revia mugrash accent, an accent pair common in the Sifrei Emet.

change.description: Remove dagesh from vav. Add note 't'.
change.refuni: he segol ayin sheva dalet dagesh hiriq merkha yod vav dagesh
change.changeuni: he segol ayin sheva dalet dagesh hiriq merkha yod vav

notes.note: Though well-positioned, the dagesh on the vav is very faint compared to other dots on the word.
The vocalization with the dagesh didn't make sense here.

change.description: Add geresh muqdam to aleph.
change.refuni: alef hataf-patah shin shin-dot qubuts resh tsere revia yod nun vav dagesh
change.changeuni: alef hataf-patah geresh-muqdam shin shin-dot qubuts resh tsere revia yod nun vav dagesh
